[color=yellow]NOTES:[/color]

IMAGiNE bringing you another release.......... Despicable Me

Well here we go with a nice PPVRiP for you to enjoy...
We we're sent the the files from a good friend so thanks go out to him for them... :) Thanks Bro
The video and audio on this release are not to bad at all considering what type of release it is.
We did do a few things to make it that much better for you though.Anyway for this we made a small script containing crop,resize,sharpness,noise reduction,chroma,brightness
contrast,rgb eq. 
We adjusted the colours as they were quiet strong ......some slight noise to the video 
which we removed aswell.
The audio ....we decided to leave it how it was on the vobs with a AC3 audio track....

Anyway Enjoy folks....
